LanguageData.RB_BeeCargoPodCrash: You have detected a cluster of bee cargo pods crashing nearby. Who was stockpiling all this bee related material in orbit?\n\nWho knows, but perhaps you'll find something useful in the wreckage.
LanguageData.RB_InsertBeesDesc: Insert a drone in this beehouse
LanguageData.RB_InsertQueensDesc: Insert a queen bee in this beehouse
LanguageData.RB_NoDronesFound: No drones of that type found in the map
LanguageData.RB_NoQueensFound: No queens of that type found in the map
LanguageData.GU_PlaceNextToBeeHouse: The brood chamber needs to be placed adjacent to a beehouse
LanguageData.RB_BeehouseNotYetBuilt: The beehouse needs to be finished before you can place this chamber!
LanguageData.GU_NoAdjacentBeehouse: Warning: this brood chamber has no adjacent beehouse
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseInactive: Adjacent beehouse is inactive right now
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseRunning: The brood chamber is attached to a beehouse, and will occasionally produce drones and queens of one of the bee species present on it
LanguageData.RB_CommandBeehouseMakeGrowingZoneDesc: Create a growing zone around this beehouse exactly matching the shape of the bee's influence over crop harvests.
LanguageData.GU_PlaceNextToBeeHouseLeft: The hybridization chamber needs to be placed adjacent to a beehouse
LanguageData.GU_NoAdjacentBeehouseHybridization: Warning: this hybridization chamber has no adjacent beehouse
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseRunningHybridization: Hybridization chamber attached to a beehouse. It will occasionally produce mutant queens if possible. To create drones, insert the queen in the beehouse and attach a Brood Chamber
LanguageData.GU_HybridMutationsRunning: Mutations are random, happening between {0} to {1} days (currently running)
LanguageData.GU_HybridMutationsStopped: Mutations are random, happening between {0} to {1} days (currently stopped)
LanguageData.RB_NoHybrid: This combination of bees produces no mutations. You should consider changing them or removing the hybridization chamber!
LanguageData.RB_Hybrid: A new mutant bee, {0}, has been created in a hybridization chamber! This combination produces no other different mutations.
LanguageData.RB_HybridNumberAlert: A new mutant bee, {1}, has been created in a hybridization chamber! This combination produces other {0} possible mutations.
LanguageData.RB_DestroyResearchLabel: Destroy Research. Warning, this will destroy this research. Use this if you have already looked at the combination and don't need to have it around anymore.
LanguageData.RB_HandlerBees_TameSuccess: Your handler bees have successfully tamed a {0}.
LanguageData.RB_StartMeadInsertionDesc: Bring mead must to the barrel to start processing
LanguageData.RB_CancelBringingMeadDesc: Cancel bringing mead must to the barrel.
LanguageData.AB_MeadFermentingBarrelNotWorking: This mead fermenting barrel is not working at the moment
LanguageData.RB_IgnoreRain: Bees ignore presence of weather (such as rain)
LanguageData.RB_IgnoreTemperature: Bees ignore temperature in the map
LanguageData.RB_IgnorePlants: Bees ignore the need for plants or other nearby materials
LanguageData.RB_GreenhouseBees: Greenhouse bees. Bees consider indoor temperature instead of map average
LanguageData.RB_CarryBees: Carry combs and bees to storage
LanguageData.RB_CarryBees_Description: By default, anything extracted from beehouses and chambers is carried by the pawn that extracted it to available storage. If this is deselected, they'll just drop it on the ground.
LanguageData.RB_BeeProductionMultiplierTooltip: Do you want your bee combs to produce an insane number of items? With this multiplier you can make it an insane as you desire. Spaceships powered by bees? Sure, why not? If a comb would produce less than 1 of something, it defaults to 1.
LanguageData.RB_BeehouseEffectRadiusTooltip: The radius on which a beehouse will produce its effects. This affects both the pollination effect on harvested plants, the size of the growing zone created around it, and the radius on which bees will look for their needed flower / product. 6 tiles by default. Higher values are laggier.
LanguageData.RB_WorkerBeeEffectMultiplierTooltip: "Helpful" Effects from worker bees will be multiplied by this factor. This will have no effect on some of the effects, such as cleaning, or firefoam, but it will scale repair amount, battery charging, research and heat pushing. High or low numbers might be super wacky. 1 by default.
LanguageData.RB_DamageBeeEffectMultiplierTooltip: Damage Effects from bees will be multiplied by this factor. For example, Stab damage from Commando bees, or toxic damage from Noxious bees. 1 by default.
LanguageData.RB_BroodChamberMultiplierTooltip: The speed at which brood chambers work. 3 days by default.
LanguageData.RB_HybridizationChamberMultiplierTooltip: A multiplier for the speed at which hybridization chambers work. 1 to 3 days (random) by default. Lower values means faster. Higher values mean slower chambers.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_Alert_BeeDanger_: Bees are taking environmental damage. Click the alert to jump to the bees.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_showMissingBees_: Show an icon on beehouses that are missing a queen or a drone and do not have one selected for insertion.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_showProgress_des: Adds a progress bar to beehouses, brood chambers, and hybridization chambers.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_beeDangerAlert_d: Show an alert when bees are taking environmental damage such as from temperature or from being left on the ground outdoors.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_knownBees_desc: Adds a "view research" button to the bee research table.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_KnownBees_Select: Select a second species to see hybrids.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_KnownBees_Unknow: Unknown. Use a hybridization chamber to research this combination.
LanguageData.BenLubarsRimBeesPatches_KnownBees_NoResu: This combination does not produce any results.
